name: CORG-E
description:
2505: Humanity starts a mission to explore space. Autonomous research ships are sent into space, all equipped with an Explorer robot, called CORG-E. These robots are shot onto a planet’s surface, with the sole purpose to explore the planet and gather as much data, as possible.

A planet, somewhere in space. A spaceship comes into view. On its hull, the letters M.A.M. are visible. With a loud BANG, a small pod is shot from the belly of the ship. It races towards the planet and disappears into its atmosphere. On the planet’s surface, a few alien creatures seem to live together in a village. Suddenly a loud BOOM shakes the village and its residents. Not far from the village, the pod has crashed into the field. As the pod opens, a small robot drives out of a hatch on its tracks. An antenna extends from its back.
